column1: '''The Beatles''' were a legendary band, made up of [[wikipedia:John Lennon

column2: Tolkien fans]], and in the 1960s, they wanted to make their own adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. George Harrison wanted to play [[Gandalf]], [[Frodo Baggins]] was to be played by Paul McCartney, and Ringo Starr to play the part of [[Samwise Gamgee]]. [[wikipedia:Twiggy
column3: Twiggy]] was to appear as [[Galadriel]]. Unfortunately for The Beatles, Tolkien disliked the idea, and still owning the rights to the films, the idea perished.<ref>[http://blastr.com/2010/11/little-known-sci-fi-facts.php Little-known sci-fi facts: Tolkien killed a Beatles LOTR movie] at [http://blastr.com/ Blastr.com] (accessed 4 September 2011)</ref>
